summary: AN ORDINANCE vacating a portion of Diagonal Avenue South and a portion of South Dakota Street on the petition of Washington Trucking Association and others; accepting an easement for storm drains and sanitary sewers in South Dakota Street; accepting an easement for electrical transmission system in Diagonal Avenue South; accepting three deeds to portions of Diagonal Avenue South; and authorizing the execution of two deeds in Diagonal Avenue South. (CF 286405; R/W No. 8401-4).
